main.bio: Hi there! I am Fizan Bin Faisal! You might also know me as CleverProgrammerFizan. I've been coding for over 2 years now. As a begenner I've worked both with large and small Projects to enhance my skills. Along the journey I realised my passion existed in helping others to create the websites and application in there mind and I also help others to be a good programmer. With this passion, I have created more than 15 Small and large Projects along this years. Through Youtube Programming courses I have Learned to bring my ideas come to life. I deliver REAL VALUE by Bringing REAL WORLD projects to help My Clients to bring thier idea's come to life. Youâ€™ll get the exact thing that is on your mind without any pain.

testimonials.text: Fizan's work has blown my mind at this age no one can do better as him...
Fizan is the most smart student I have ever seen in my whole carrier I have never seen a kid who is that smart as him... !
